Summary: Save money...order it in boxes instead of tins
text:
The boxed version is significantly less per ounce. "McCANN'S Steel Cut Irish Oatmeal, Quick & Easy, 16-Ounce Boxes (Pack of 6)" When I last ordered, the price was $0.17 cents per oz, versus $.23 for the tins. I keep the oatmeal from getting stale when I open a box by dumping it into an empty tin. Nobody has to know that I'm cheap. :>)

Same stuff, less money. Can't complain about that...
